title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 117.0 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 117.0 - General

State Regulations

In order to be eligible for appointment by
a Family Court to assist the court, a CASA program must be in compliance with
the provisions of section
117.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
117.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
